review: I only use this to mirror movies from my phone to the TV. The device is very small. It works well and the image is good on my 55" hdtv. I have a smart tv so I don't use the other functions.Recognize that each app developer chooses whether the app can be mirrored. Some tv and movie apps such as the dish network app has mirroring blocked. I have only one satellite box so I've used this to watch shows from my bedroom TV not hooked into the satellite box. It worked as expected. I give it 4 stars because some apps are blocked and no way to tell until after you buy this.
